title: HOPE: Short Inspirational Stories
description: This eBook is a biographical account of the life-changing experience of HOPE that was gifted to the author, as a child, in 1953. In this 5000-word short story, you will meet the real-life girl who inspired the fictional character Emily in the acclaimed series, The Stolen Years and A New Beginning. Following this short story, is a 13,500-word sample of To Kill for a Ghost, Book 1: The Stolen Years by Ryn Shell.
author: Ryn Shell
